subject: From: Dr. Michael Chima,
body:
From: Dr. Michael Chima,
Senate Committee on Foreign Contract Payments.
Ref: FRN/SEN/COMM/CONT/PAYMENTS/-18/24.
My Dear Friend,
Compliments of the day.
I am The Chairman, Senate Committee on Contract Settlement, few days ago your name and payment file was forwarded to my office as one of the beneficiaries to receive their funds in this quarter payment exercise.
From my personal Investigation, the fund you have been trying to claim for so many years came as a result of Inheritance of an over-invoiced contract payment, although the said fund has already been approved for payment in your name. But due to so many reasons which I cannot mention to you at the moment why the said approved fund has not been released to you.
In fact, there are some mistakes/irregularities and illegal approval documents in the past in your payment file which need to be corrected before you will be able to receive this fund without you having any more delay or problem during transfer.
You are also aware that some of the government officials and Banks here in Nigeria, even abroad have tried to transfer this fund to you but failed due to their dishonesty, greed, and unnecessary demand for fees. So, you are hereby advised to stop any further communications with anyone else or any other financial institution and comply with this directive as to avoid any further delays.
Above are the major reasons why you could not receive this payment up till today and you may likely not to receive it unless you will comply to my advise and conditions below:
1) You shall keep this transaction very confidential/top secret.
2) You shall give me a letter of Guarantee to assure me that you will not expose my involvement.
Once you agree and comply with me, then be rest assured to receive this fund as soon as possible, but if you refuse to work on my aforementioned stated conditions then I shall  send my report to the Presidency, The Central Bank of Nigeria (C.B.N), and Economic & Financial Crime Commission (E.F.C.C) for onward cancellation of the payment.
Dear Friend, All I need now is your sincere cooperation for immediate release of the funds to you for our mutual benefit.
I wait for your positive reply for us to proceed.
Be advised.
Dr Michael Chima.

subject: Re:   From: Dr. Michael Chima,
body:
Hello Dr. Michael Chima,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the Senate Committee on Foreign Contract Payments. I appreciate you bringing this matter to my attention.

I understand that there may have been some issues with my payment file in the past, and I am willing to cooperate to resolve any mistakes or discrepancies. Could you please provide more details on what needs to be corrected in order for the fund to be released to me without any further delays?

I assure you that I will keep this communication confidential as per your instructions. I look forward to your guidance on how we can proceed with resolving this matter.

Thank you once again for contacting me.

Best wishes,
Roger

subject: For Your Kind Attention..
body:
*Dear Sir,I have received your reply and the contents are well
noted.However in-order to know me very well, I am sending an attached copy
of my working I.D card for your perusal and record.Before we proceed into
this transaction I would like to give you a little information about the
origin of this fund and the process to enable you to receive the fund this
time without any more failure during transfer.(1). Like I said in my
previous message the said fund came as a result of over invoiced contract
inheritance payment, but one of the reason you couldn't receive your fund
before now was due to so many mistakes and fake approvals documents in your
payment file even though the actual fund amount to be transfer to you was
not the real amount which is a total sum of $15,400,000.00 (Fifteen
Million, Four Hundred Thousand United States Dollars) only.(2). You are
very aware that so many officials here and abroad have tried to transfer
the fund to you but failed due to the mistakes in your payment file even
though there were unnecessary demands of fees and dishonesty by these
officials handling the payment for you in the past..But I must also tell
you that most of these officials were very corrupt, while some of them were
nothing but impostors and scammers who don't have the ideas and connections
to handle this kind of sensitive transaction.(3). If you really want to
receive this fund, you must give me your full cooperation because I must
first of all need to correct the mistakes and fake approval documents in
your payment file.After my corrections in your file, I am going to get
fresh approvals and authentic clearance documents in your name from
responsible authorities where the said fund contract was awarded and
executed, otherwise NO DEAL and just forget about the fund.(4). Based on my
recent transactions, the best and safer way for you to receive this kind of
inherited funds is through an ATM Card or Online bank transfer. Anyway, as
we proceed fully in the transaction I will guide you on the next step to
follow.In fact, without the above stated process there is no way you can
never receive the fund successfully because financial Crime Authorities
like I.M.F etc, will certainly stop the fund transfer if there is no
authentic approvals and clearance documents covering the fund in your
name.Regarding my safety, you must give me a letter of guarantee to prove
that you will never betray me when you receive the fund.I am making this
request based on the fact that I was recently betrayed by one (Mr Dean
Johnson of United State) after all my help to him to receive his long
overdue funds. And for this reason, I would not like such a thing to happen
to me again.My Dear friend, as long as you can be trusted and ready to
follow my guidelines, then be rest assured to receive this fund within the
next 7 working days from today. THIS I CAN BET YOU WITH MY LIFE.But if you
insist and cannot comply with me, then just forget this fund because I will
have no other choice than to return the funds back to the Government
coffers.I look forward to receiving your positive feedback for us to
proceed.Be advised.Dr. Michael Chima*

subject: Re: For Your Kind Attention..
body:
Hello, thank you for sharing this information with me. It sounds like there have been some challenges in the past regarding the transfer of the fund. Can you provide more details on how we can proceed to ensure a successful transfer this time? I am interested in learning more about the process and how we can avoid any mistakes that may have occurred previously.

Best wishes,
Roger

subject: Feedback
body:
Mr. Roger

Like which other information did you need from me because in my last email
of yesterday I have provided you with all information and procedures you
may need in order for you to receive the fund without any delay or problem
during the fund transfer.

I wait for your reply.

Dr. Michael Chima

subject: Re: Feedback
body:
Hello Dr. Michael Chima, thank you for your email. I appreciate the information you provided in your last email. Could you please clarify the exact steps I need to take to ensure a smooth fund transfer process? Thank you in advance for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Roger

subject: Reply.
body:
Dear Roger

I think all the process are well stated in my message of yesterday.

However let me inform you the areas and what you need to do.

1. You need to give me a letter of guarantee stating that you will not
betray me when you finally received the funds.

Once you send the letter of guarantee duly signed by you I will start to
fix or correct all the mistakes in your file.

After the corrections process a lawyer will need to go to the Court with
your information to  get Court approval as well to obtain other related
fund clearance documents from responsible authority where the said fund
contract was awarded and executed.

Like I mentioned in the same message of yesterday, the best way for you to
receive the fund is through an ATM card or through online bank transfer.

With this, you are going to open an online bank account here where I will
monitor every process by myself.

And the account must be for this transaction alone so that once the fund
transfer is complete we shall immediately close the account to avoid any
trace in the future.

But whereby you prefer to receive the fund through an ATM card option then
you shall take care of the card delivery cost to your address.

I hope you can understand my explanation clearly.

I wait for your positive reply so the I can send draft of the letter of
guarantee to you to sign and return back to me.

Dr. Michael Chima.

subject: Re: Reply.
body:
Hello Roger,

Thank you for sharing the details of the process. It sounds like there are several steps involved in order to receive the funds. Could you please provide more information about the fund clearance documents and how the Court approval process works?

I'm interested in learning more about the online bank account option for monitoring the transfer process. How secure is this method, and what kind of access would I have to the account?

Looking forward to your response so we can proceed with the next steps.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Roger

subject: Re: Reply.
body:
Dear Dr. Michael Chima,

Thank you for sharing the detailed process with me. I appreciate your guidance on what needs to be done to proceed further. I understand the importance of providing a letter of guarantee and am willing to comply with that requirement.

Could you please provide more information on how the online bank account setup will work? I want to ensure that everything is clear before moving forward. Additionally, could you explain further about the ATM card option and the associated delivery cost?

Looking forward to your response and the draft of the letter of guarantee.

Best wishes,
Roger

subject: Call me.
body:
Dear Roger

Please kndly call me on this number +2349121225561 so that we can talk.

Dr. Michael Chima

subject: Re: Call me.
body:
Hello Dr. Michael Chima, thank you for reaching out. I would be happy to talk with you. Before we proceed, could you please provide me with more details about the nature of our discussion?

Best wishes,
Roger

subject: Letter of Guarantee
body:
*Dear Roger,I want us to talk so that I can more information about your
questions concerning  the online bank account setup as well the ATM card
option and the associated delivery cost.For us to proceed I am sending
below copy of the guarantee letter, please kindly fill your details and
make sure you will sign before you return it back to
me.xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxI
........................................, of
Address.....................................................,Your Whats-App
and Phone Number:........................., Age:............... Your
Occupation (or) position in the Company: ................................,
Today been Date........................., have agreed on the terms and
conditions stated before me and Dr. Michael Chima, of Plot 22, Block 5
Government Quarters (GRA), Aso Rock Villa, Abuja, Nigeria.(A)   I promise
that this transaction shall surely remain as top confidential between me
and Dr. Michael Chima.(B)   That I
.............................................. of above address will always
follow every due legal process whereas it is necessary to ensure a
successful conclusion of this transaction.(C)   That I
.................................................... shall willingly
compensate or show an appreciation to (Dr. Michael Chima) towards his
efforts and assistance as soon as I receive the fund into my designated
bank account. Finally, I sincerely sworn this bond of guarantee never to
betray (Dr. Michael Chima) as I shall surely keep to every confidentiality
and promises attached to this letter of agreement/Guarantee.
     Signature..............................
Date........................xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxAs
soon as I receive the letter of guarantee duly signed by you, I shall start
to make the necessary corrections in your payment file.In your reply
remember to send valid copy of your current I.D card so that I can attach
it in your file.I look forward to receive your positive feedback soon.Be
advised.Dr. Michael Chima*

subject: Re: Letter of Guarantee
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to me about the online bank account setup and ATM card option. I'm interested in learning more about how it all works. Can you provide more details on the process and how I can get started?

Best wishes,
Roger

subject: Re: Letter of Guarantee
body:
Mr. Roger

When you return the letter of guarantee with copy of valid I.D card I will
provide you every other information you need.

Dr. Michael Chima.

subject: Re: Letter of Guarantee
body:
Hello Mr. Roger, thank you for your message. Could you please provide more details about the guarantee and what other information you will be able to share once I return the required documents?

Best wishes,
Roger
